834040.name: Game Tengoku - TATSUJIN
834040.description:
The legendary Toaplan shooting game, TATSUJIN/TRUXTON makes its Game Tengoku debut!

Contents

The Super Fighter works differently to the other ships in Game Tengoku. Firstly, it comes equipped with 3 weapons; Power Shot, Tatsujin Beam, Thunder Laser and the Tatsujin bomb. You can switch between them by collecting the appropriate coloured "P" item. The options appear when the ship is powered up rather than via items.

The Super Fighter can be used in Arcade Mode + and scores can be recorded in the on-line leaderboards.
The DLC also adds a new page to the Data Mode HD library where you can look at flyers, screenshots and other documents related to the game while listening to commentary by the game's characters.
It also comes with two music tracks; the original stage 1 theme by Masahiro Yuge and a remix by Tatsuya Uemura (BGM Type > Classic Type)!

Character Profile

Commentator: Yuki Ito (voice: Kumiko Nishihara)
Illustration: Jiji

The game whose mechanics laid the groundwork for many shooting games which followed it.
Remembered for its difficulty, the Thunder Laser and the Thunder Laser's lack of any real punch.
834040.supported_languages:
日语*, 英语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
